title: "Costa Zen"

## About Costa Zen

<div id="centerInfo">Loading...</div>

<script>
const centerId = "costa-zen";

Promise.all([
  fetch("../data/centers.json").then(res => res.json()),
  fetch("../data/professors.json").then(res => res.json())
])
.then(([centers, professors]) => {
  const center = centers.find(c => c.id === centerId);
  if (!center) {
    document.getElementById("centerInfo").innerHTML = "<p>Center not found.</p>";
    return;
  }

  const profData = center.professors.map(pid => 
    professors.find(p => p.id === pid)
  ).filter(p => p);

  document.getElementById("centerInfo").innerHTML = `
    <p>Welcome to ${center.name} in ${center.city}.</p>

    <h3>Styles Offered</h3>
    <ul>${center.styles.map(s => `<li>${s}</li>`).join("")}</ul>

    <h3>Languages Spoken</h3>
    <ul>${center.languages.map(l => `<li>${l}</li>`).join("")}</ul>

    <h3>Professors</h3>
    <ul>
      ${profData.map(p => 
        `<li><a href="../professors/${p.id.toLowerCase().replace(/\\s+/g,'-')}.html">${p.name}</a></li>`
      ).join("")}
    </ul>
  `;
})
.catch(err => {
  console.error(err);
  document.getElementById("centerInfo").innerHTML = "<p>Error loading data.</p>";
});
</script>
